This repository contains the data, code, and figures used in:

Schramm M, Gitter A, Rambo J, DeVilleneuve S, Rhodes E, Gregory L. Forthcoming. Comparison of Daily Streamflow Estimation Methods in the Thompsons Creek Watershed. College Station, TX: Texas Water Resources Institute.




The TSD-Appendix folder contains code used for the Appendix and streamflow simulations in:

Ahimbisibwe D, Jordan T, Schramm M. Forthcoming. Final Report for Thompsons Creek Project. College Station, TX: Texas Water Resources Institute.
